info: Kelvyn Laurence Smith runs the well-oiled 'Mr Smith Letterpress Workshop' in Kennington, London. Mr Smith is a Polymath â€” a craftsman, designer, typographer, printmaker, wordsmith & maker. He is of strong temperament & is chiefly concerned with problem solving, attention to detail, good practice & quality workmanship. He creates exquisitely crafted contemporary typographic printed matter using an collection of English traditional wood and metal types in his Letterpress workshop.

project: The project began as an induction in to a craft. Learning the equipment and tools required to create an individual type face. Using analog equipment and no computers in the workshop, The instruments used are all hand carved from wood and made from metal. Through a series of visits to Mr.Smith and his workshop, getting hands on with the equipment and learning spacing, fonts, font sizes and complimentary designs and layouts for print. Jonathan left the workshop with a catalogue of prints.
